--- alter_statistics.sql
ALTER STATISTICS auto_20191128_14_47_22UTC SET OPTIONS (allow_gc=false)
--- AST
&ast.AlterStatistics{
  Alter: 0,
  Name:  &ast.Ident{
    NamePos: 17,
    NameEnd: 42,
    Name:    "auto_20191128_14_47_22UTC",
  },
  Options: &ast.Options{
    Options: 47,
    Rparen:  70,
    Records: []*ast.OptionsDef{
      &ast.OptionsDef{
        Name: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 56,
          NameEnd: 64,
          Name:    "allow_gc",
        },
        Value: &ast.BoolLiteral{
          ValuePos: 65,
          Value:    false,
        },
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
ALTER STATISTICS auto_20191128_14_47_22UTC SET OPTIONS (allow_gc = false)
